info.description: This is not quote API but Quote notification API. This API must be deployed on client/subscriber side to receive notification
info.title: API QuoteNotification

tags.name: Notification
tags.description: Notification class is used to describe structure used for quote notification (quote created, quote state change, quote information required, quote attribute value change

post.description:
Quote creation notification structure definition

Specific business errors for current operation will be encapsulated in

HTTP Response 422 Unprocessable entity

400.description:
Bad Request

List of supported error codes:
- 20: Invalid URL parameter value
- 21: Missing body
- 22: Invalid body
- 23: Missing body field
- 24: Invalid body field
- 25: Missing header
- 26: Invalid header value
- 27: Missing query-string parameter
- 28: Invalid query-string parameter value

401.description:
Unauthorized

List of supported error codes:
- 40: Missing credentials
- 41: Invalid credentials
- 42: Expired credentials

403.description:
Forbidden

List of supported error codes:
- 50: Access denied
- 51: Forbidden requester
- 52: Forbidden user
- 53: Too many requests

404.description:
Not Found

List of supported error codes:
- 60: Resource not found

405.description:
Method Not Allowed

List of supported error codes:
- 61: Method not allowed

500.description:
Internal Server Error

List of supported error codes:
- 1: Internal error

503.description:
Service Unavailable

List of supported error codes:
- 5: The service is temporarily unavailable
- 6: Orange API is over capacity, retry later !

post.description:
Quote information required notification structure description.
Attribute resourcePatch allows to target quote but also quoteItem - example: resourcePath":"/quote/42/quoteItem/3" is the item #3 of quote #42
Attribute fieldPath allows to target missing information: fieldPath":"missing=quote.relatedParty.Role.value&party.id=46" means role information is missing for party 46.

Specific business errors for current operation will be encapsulated in

HTTP Response 422 Unprocessable entity

post.summary: Quote attribute value change notification structure
post.description:
Quote attribute value change notification structure description.
Attribute resourcePatch allows to target quote but also quoteItem - example: resourcePath":"/quote/42/quoteItem/3" is the item #3 of quote #42
Attribute fieldPath allows to target attribute with value changed.

ErrorRepresentation.description: Class used to describe API response error

code.description: Application related code (as defined in the API or from a common list)

reason.description: Text that explains the reason for error. This can be shown to a client user.

message.description: Text that provide mode details and corrective actions related to the error.  This can be shown to a client user.

status.description: Http error code extension like 400-2 for example

referenceError.description: url pointing to documentation describing the error

@schemaLocation.description: Link to the schema describing the REST resource

TimePeriod.description: Indicates a time period for validity.

PriceAlteration.description: Is an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for an order item

name.description: A short descriptive name such as "Monthly discount".

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this order item price alteration.

priceType.description: A category that describes the price such as recurring, one time and usage.

applicationDuration.description: Duration during which the alteration applies on the order item price (for instance 2 months free of charge for the recurring charge).

priority.description: Priority level for applying this alteration among all the defined alterations on the order item price

@type.description: Indicates the (class) type of the price alteration

@schemaLocation.description: Link to the schema describing this REST resource

Price.description: Provides all amounts (tax included, duty free, tax rate), used Money structure for currency

percentage.description: Percentage to apply only for ProdOfferPriceAlteration

@type.description: Indicates the (class) type of the price

@schemaLocation.description: Link to the schema describing this REST resource

priceVariation.description:
priceVariation allows to describe a variation on the price for budgetary or indicative quote.
It is understood as a percentage.
A 25 here means that Amount provided could be +/- 25% less or more.

QuoteItem.description: A quote items describe an action to be performed on a productOffering or a product in order to get pricing elements and condition

id.description: Identifier of the quote item (generally it is a sequence number 01, 02, 03, ...).

action.description: Action to be perfomed on this quote item (add, modify, remove, etc.).

@type.description: Indicates the base (class) type of the quote Item.

@schemaLocation.description: Link to the schema describing this REST resource

RelatedPartyRef.description: A related party defines party or party role linked to a quote.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a party role reference.

@referredType.description: Indicates the base (class) type of the party.

Product.description: Configure the product characteristics (only configurable characteristics and necessary only if a non default value is selected) and/or identify the product that needs to be modified/deleted

@type.description: Technical attribute to extend this class

ProductOfferingRef.description: A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering

@referredType.description: Indicate the class (type) of product offering.

QuotePrice.description: Description of price and discount awarded.

priceType.description: indicate if the price is for recurrent or no-recurrent charge

recurringChargePeriod.description: Used for recurring charge to indicate period (month, week, etc..)

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of Measure if price depending on it (Gb, SMS volume, etc..).

name.description: Name of the quote /quote item price

description.description: Description of the quote/quote item price.

@type.description: Indicates the base (class) type of the quote price

@schemaLocation.description: link to the schema describing this REST resource

ProductSpecificationRef.description: A ProductSpecification is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

Money.description: A base / value business entity used to represent money

unit.description: Currency (ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency

Describing.description: Target to the schema describing the product spec resource (and type)

@schemaLocation.description: This field provided a link to the schema describing this REST resource.

QuoteItemRelationship.description: Used to describe relationship between quote item. These relationships could have an impact on pricing and conditions.

id.description: ID of the related order item (must be in the same quote).

type.description: Relationship type as relies on, bundles, etc...

PriceRange.description: PriceRange class allows to describe a range of price (Min/Max) for budgetary or indicative quote.

QuoteSummaryView.description: Quote Summary view is provided in the response of the GET(LIST) quote. Only a subset of information are provided.

externalId.description: ID given by the consumer and only understandable by him (to facilitate his searches afterwards)

category.description: Used to categorize the quote from a business perspective that can be useful for the CRM system (e.g. “enterprise”, “residential”, ...)

quoteDate.description: Date when the quote was created

requestedQuoteCompletionDate.description: This is the date wished by the requester to have the quote completed (meaning priced)

expectedQuoteCompletionDate.description: This is the date filled by the seller to indicate expected quote completion date.

expectedFulfillmentStartDate.description: This is the date wished by the requester to have the requested quote item(s) delivered

effectiveQuoteCompletionDate.description: Date when the quoted was Cancelled or Rejected or Accepted

@baseType.description: Indicates the base (class) type of the quote.

@type.description: Indicates the (class) type of the quote.

@schemaLocation.description: Link to the schema describing the REST resource.

Notification.description: This class is created only to gather Notification data structure. This structure must be send to the callback url provided in the HUB resource.

Event.description: Event class is used to describe information structure used for notification.

EventPlus.description: EventPlus class is used to extend information structure used for notification (adding resource & field paths)

resourcePath.description: Path to the resource (where an information is required or an attribute changed value)

fieldPath.description: Path to the field which has value changed or information required
